title: Project fails to compile whenever microprofile-config-api is included on a submodule
body:
### Describe the bug

A maven project is failing to compile whenever microprofile-config-api is included on a submodule, however it doesn't fail if it is included on its root, only.

I've created a test project to demonstrate this.
[getting-started.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/11908609/getting-started.zip)


### Expected behavior

The project should compile.

### Actual behavior

Project fails to compile with the following error:
```
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.1.2.Final:build (default) on project untitled: Failed to build quarkus application: SRCFG00039: The config property quarkus.test.hang-detection-timeout with the config value "10m" threw an Exception whilst being converted SRCFG00020: Failed to convert value with static method: InvocationTargetException: Text cannot be parsed to a Duration -> [Help 1]
```
